ATy.caption: Token Address
ATy.doc: The token contract address of the token being sent.
ATy.name: token_address

ATz.caption: RPC URL
ATz.doc: Provide a RPC url  for the network this NFT smart contracts deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
ATz.name: default_provider

AUA.caption: To Address
AUA.doc: The address that will receive the tokens.
AUA.name: to_address

AUB.caption: Amount
AUB.doc: The amount of the token being sent. 1 = 1 ETH.
AUB.name: amount
